name: Stardust Odyssey + Soundtrack
description:
This bundle contains the game and its unique soundtrack.

The evil of the Abyss has returned, and it is up to you to stop the threat!
Jump aboard your Ethercraft and explore the most powerful convoys of the world of Stardust Odyssey!
Navigate through merchant ships filled with treasures, search for the mysterious hidden Ethers, upgrade your ship, and defeat colossal Guardians in epic boss battles!

• In a world specifically designed for VR, immerse yourself in the most captivating adventure!
• Solo or co-op, invite a friend and fight the growing evil of the Abyss together.
• Thwart the traps set by the Guardians and dodge the dangerous patrols.
• Cast powerful spells and combine their effects!

Will you be able to counter the growing evil of the Abyss and escape the Kraken?

Mixing modern occidental music and traditional oriental instruments like the duduk (flute) and oud (lute), this soundtrack transports listeners to the enchanting and exotic world of Stardust Odyssey.

Two PlayStation®Move motion controllers required.
